SIG-Game Webserver

Hello there. SIG-Game's competition application is currently unavailable. We have intentionally taken it offline for one of the following reasons:

  • Scheduled maintenance
  • To save computing costs and energy
  • A third reason

This page is only shown if a SIG-Game Developer has intentionally redirected you here. However, if you believe that you are seeing this page in error, please contact us. It is possible that we forgot to update our DNS record.

Thank you.
